name: WaW: Autumn Adventure
description:
Your character receives a letter at Hogwarts, after which he (or she) experiences a special adventure there. The game is intended for fans and is, in fact, a graphic fan fiction. However, the game is over and has 16 different finals. Unlike the main version, this game is suitable for a teen audience. It contains two new quests, in addition, the main plot is redesigned.

At the moment, the game is in the "public alpha testing" stage.
This is a standalone project based on the resources of our main game.
